name: Save The Teddy
description: Save The Teddy is a global game jam 2021 submission following the theme of lost and found. In Save The Teddy you will play as a child who lost there teddy in a nightmare and the only way to get out of the nightmare is by going through a maze and finding it. You will have to move fast as a giant spider will be chasing you down, take to many wrong turns and it will be game over. You can't go to fast either as every time you get scared your heart rate will raise and need time to go back down, if it reaches 250 it is game over.
